data.expected_result: The motion should be fluid and not slow like stable 2.2.4
data.short_description: Considerable lagg when switching servers on TestFlight 2.2.5 , that didn’t exist on stable 2.2.4
data.steps_to_repro: - Download stable 2.2.4 - Go into discord and switch between some channels in different servers  - Observer that this happens with very minimal lag - Now close out of discord and download TestFlight 2.2.5 - Now open discord and switch between channels and servers - Observer discord notice that the motion is slowed considerably
